name: Wisaksil Wangek
bio:
Wisaksil Wangek, also known by his nickname "[]", is a talented Thai boxer who has made a name for himself in the world of professional boxing. Born on December 8, 1986, Wangek has been honing his skills in the ring for over two decades, proving to be a formidable force in the super flyweight weight class.

Standing at a height of 160cm and boasting a reach of 161cm, Wangek may not be the tallest boxer in his weight class, but what he lacks in height, he more than makes up for with his skill and determination. Known for his southpaw stance, Wangek has a unique style that keeps his opponents on their toes.

At a weight of 63.5kg, Wangek competes in the super flyweight division, which is known for its fast-paced and highly skilled fighters. This weight class showcases boxers who are agile, quick on their feet, and possess lightning-fast reflexes.

Wangek's journey in professional boxing has been nothing short of remarkable. He has faced numerous opponents throughout his career, each one presenting a unique challenge. Wangek's ability to adapt to different styles and adjust his strategy accordingly has made him a force to be reckoned with in the ring.

One of the defining moments of Wangek's career came in 2017 when he faced off against the legendary Roman "Chocolatito" Gonzalez. Wangek not only defeated Gonzalez but also caused a major upset in the boxing world by knocking him out in the fourth round. This victory catapulted Wangek into the spotlight and earned him the WBC super flyweight title.

Since then, Wangek has successfully defended his title multiple times, showcasing his skills and proving that he is a worthy champion. With each fight, he continues to impress fans and critics alike with his precise punches, quick footwork, and relentless determination.

Wangek's fighting style is a perfect reflection of his tenacity and never-give-up attitude. He is known for relentlessly pursuing his opponents, constantly pressuring them and making them work for every moment in the ring. His punches come at his opponents in quick succession, often catching them off guard and leaving them struggling to find a counter.

But it's not just Wangek's physical abilities that make him a standout boxer. His mental fortitude and discipline play a crucial role in his success. He is known for his unwavering focus and dedication to his craft, constantly pushing himself to be better with each training session and fight.

Wangek's rise to stardom has not been without its challenges. With the spotlight comes increased expectations and pressure to perform. However, Wangek has proven time and time again that he thrives under pressure, using it as fuel to further ignite his passion for the sport.

Looking forward, Wangek has his sights set on continuing his reign as the super flyweight champion. His unwavering determination and unmatched skill set make him a formidable opponent for anyone in his weight class.

As fans, we can only watch in awe as Wangek continues to leave his mark on the world of professional boxing. With each fight, he reminds us why we fell in love with the sport in the first place â€“ the excitement, the unpredictability, and the never-ending pursuit of greatness. Wangek is a true testament to the beauty and artistry of boxing, and his legacy will undoubtedly be remembered for years to come.
